Welcome Jo Mattocks to the group!

Published: Apr 1, 2022 by Ailith

We are delighted to welcome Jo Mattocks to the group for the duration of her PhD studies. Jo is part of the highly-competitive MRC Human Genetics Unit 4-year PhD programme and we are excited to support Jo in her studies over the next few years.

Jo is interested in the modelling of spatiotemporal trajectories of mutation in high grade serous ovarian cancers.

We are currently expanding the group so please keep an eye out for post-doc ads coming very soon!
